summary: Defines core data structures for a token‑based text‑normalization tagging system, including representations of editing tasks, token edit tags, token boundaries, and swap contract categories, along with utilities to merge multiple source texts and produce the final edited output.
business_intent: Enable precise, token‑level editing and normalization of textual data in NLP pipelines, facilitating downstream speech or language models to apply rule‑based or learned transformations.
